Quincy Sumbo Ayodele, nke a maara dị ka Quincy, bụ onye Naijiria na-ahụ maka iji mkpọrọgwụ na mkpaakwụkwọ were agwọ oria, onye ọchụnta ego, onye na-ahụ maka ọgwụgwọ ahịhịa na nlekọta anụ ahụ na onye isi oche nke Quincy Herbals, onye Naijiria na-ahụ maka nlekọta ahụike ahịhịa
Ọ bụ onye kọmitii ọkachamara nke Òtù Ahụ Ike Mba Ụwa na mmepe nke ọgwụ ọdịnala na omume Africa
Ọ bụ onye na-akwado maka ntinye ọgwụ ọdịnala Africa n'ime usoro nlekọta ahụike.
Quincy bụ onye guzobere Herbal Slimmers and Weight Loss Association of Nigeria na ode akwukwọ nke mbu nke otu National Association of Nigerian Traditional Medicine Practitioners (NANTMP)
O hibere otu a na-adịghị akwụ ụgwọ a kpọrọ Self-Employed Women Association of Nigeria (SEWAN), nke gbadoro anya na ịzụ ahịa ụmụ nwanyị
Tupu e hiwe Quincy Herbals, ọ bụ odeakwụkwọ na Societe Generale Bank Nigeria Limited ebe o mechara bụrụ onye enyemaka nke onye isi ụlọ akụ ahụ
Amuru ya n'Abeokuta, isi obodo Ogun State, Nigeria n'ime ezinaụlọ nke Chief Amos Oluwole Sodimu
Ọ nọrọ na nọrọ nne nna ya, Mabel Osunmi Sodimu n'ime obodo Olorunsogo mgbe nne na nna ya kwagara United Kingdom bụ onye ọ mụtara nkà ọgwụ mkpọrọgwụ na mkpaakwụkwọ n'aka ya

Ọ gara African Church Primary School dị na Yambi Village na Comprehensive High School, Ayetoro nke di kwa na Ogun steeti tupu ọ gaa Ogun State Polytechnic maka nzere mana ọ hapụrụ ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ tupu ule ikpeazụ ịga Pitman's Central College, London, ebe ọ nwetara nzere diploma
n'ọchịchị odeakwụkwọ
Ọ laghachiri Naijiria, sonye n'ọrụ Societe Generale Bank Nigeria Limited dịka odeakwụkwọ, ma mechaa bụrụ onye enyemaka nke onye isi ụlọ akụ ahụ
Ọ gbara arụkwaghịm ka o jere ozi ihe karịrị afọ iri na abụọ na ngalaba ụlọ akụ, o mere nke a ka o wee guzobe azụmahịa nke ya

Tupu o hiwe Quincy Herbals, o nwetara diplọma na nkà mmụta ọgwụ sitere na Nigerian College of Natural Medicine, ụlọ akwụkwọ mgbakwunye nke Federal Ministry of Science and Technology, Victoria Island, Lagos
Ọ gụkwara akwụkwọ gbasara ọrịa naturopathy na United States wee gaa ọtụtụ ọmụmụ ihe gbasara ọgwụgwọ ọdịnala na China
O ji pụkụ naira ise wee hiwe Quincy Herbals (dọla iri na asatọ na 6 Julaị 2016)
A na-enweta ụfọdụ n'ime ego ahụ site na ire puff-puff
Quincy bụ onye kọmitii ọkachamara na otu World Health Organisation na mmepe nke ọgwụ ọdịnala na omume Africa
Ọ bụ onye na-akwado maka ntinye ọgwụ ọdịnala Africa n'ime usoro nlekọta ahụike

Ọ bụ onye guzobere Herbal Slimmers and Weight Loss Association of Nigeria na onye ode akwukwọ nke mbu nke National Association of Nigerian Traditional Medicine Practitioners (NANTMP)  O guzobekwara otu nzukọ anaghị akwụ ụgwọ, Self-Employed Women Association of Nigeria
(SEWAN) nke na-elekwasị anya na ịzụ ahịa ụmụ nwanyị
Quincy lụrụ Engr
John Oladipo Ayodele
Ha nwere ụmụ atọ: Tobi Ayodele Keeney, onye nwetara nzere masta na nọọsụ na Mahadum Maryland, Baltimore,  Marita Tola Abdul na John Temi Ayodele
Ha nwekwara ụmụ ụmụ.
